author: Matt Margolis
title: Kamala Is Running From Policy Proposals As Much As From the Media â€“ PJ Media
text: This week, we learned that Kamala Harris intends to unveil her first major policy proposal. However, she didn't plagiarize this one from Donald Trump; she plagiarized it from Soviet Russia. According to the campaign, her new policy proposal is â€œthe first-ever federal ban on price gouging on food and groceries,â€ which is just a euphemistic way of saying â€œ price controls .â€ Anyone who knows history knows that such policies donâ€™t work and backfire spectacularly. But Kamala is continuing the Biden tradition of trying to claim that Bidenomics doesn't cause inflation but that greedy corporations do and that the only way to fix the problem is for the government to step in. The critics of this proposal have come out in full force, and the policy could come under fire from friendly sources once details come out. As recently as a few months ago, CNN poured cold water on the idea that corporate greed is the leading cause of inflation. "Some progressives have frequently blamed corporate greed for fueling the high cost of living that Americans are fed up with," the report said. "Yet new research from the Federal Reserve Bank of San Francisco casts doubt on the greedflation theory." Related: Kamala Officially Chickens Out of First Debate With Trump CNN may not be so honest about it now, but it's hardly surprising that Kamala's campaign advisers are worried about revealing the specifics of her economic plan, fearing it could backfire, according to a report from the Wall Street Journal. "As they flesh out Harrisâ€™s agenda, her economic advisers have debated how detailed they should be, some of the people familiar with the discussions said, amid concerns from some Democrats that releasing a lengthy plan could open the vice president up to criticism from Republicans and members of her party," the paper reported. "The policy framework is expected to outline broad policy areas she supports, while avoiding many of the thorny details." "Harrisâ€™s ascension to the top of the ticket has energized Democrats and some allies have cautioned against doing anything that could slow that momentum, including lengthy interviews with media outlets," the article pointed out. Because we have to elect her to find out what's in her policy proposals. Meanwhile, you can go on the Trump campaign website and get all the details you need about Trump's positions and policy proposals. Related: Kamala Just Blew Up Her Excuse For Not Doing Interviews Perhaps the biggest problem Harris will face, regardless of what her proposals are and how detailed they are, is the question of why she hasn't done anything about the problems that she says she wants to fix. As the sitting vice president, she can't help but be linked to and have to run on the agenda and record of the current administration â€” which would be difficult for even a competent politician to do. ðŸš¨SINCE HARRIS TOOK OFFICEâ€” Jacki Kotkiewicz (@jackikotkiewicz) Gas: +50.5% Electricity: +31.7% Fuel oil: +49.1% Airfare: +22.6% Hotels: +51.2% Groceries: +21.6% Eating out: +23% Baby food: +30.1% K-12 food: +65.5% Rent: +22% Transportation: +32.9% Car insurance: +54% Real average weekly earnings: -3.9% [August 14, 2024] According to Axios , "Harris doesn't want to be completely defined by the Biden-Harris record," but that will be nearly impossible without a detailed agenda or policy proposals. The problem is that the devil is always in the details.

author: TOI Sports Desk
title: Tom Brady reportedly "didn't want to" divorce Gisele BÃ¼ndchen in 2022, as she now prepares for a baby with Joaquim Valente | NFL News - The Times of India
text: The NFL legend, Tom Brady, is now officially single as his ex wife, Gisele BÃ¼ndchen, is all set to welcome a child with her new boyfriend, Joaquim Valente. Tom Brady divorced his ex wife after thirteen years of marriage back in 2022. But less than a year ago, a source had revealed to the Daily Mail. that Tom Brady actually did not divorce his ex wife because â€œco-parenting is hardâ€.Tom Brady Did Not Want A Divorce From Ex Wife Gisele Bundchenhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=85U-UxNbAXsIn March 2024, the source had said to Daily Mail, \"He never wanted to divorce, especially since his relationship with Bridget endedâ€. Tom Brady shares two children with Gisele and one son with his ex girlfriend, famous actress Bridget Moynahan, whom he had met before he met Gisele. The source added that Tom Brady was apprehensive of the whole co-parenting situation because it was â€œstressfulâ€ the last time. The source also added, â€œTom would agree that co-parenting hasn't been easy. There has been a lot of love lost in their relationship, and navigating through that and their careers and finding new love has not been easy.â€â€” noteableyfood (@noteableyfood) The source had also added that the NFL legend, Tom Brady and his ex wife, Gisele BÃ¼ndchen, â€œnever expected to break upâ€.After Tom Brady and Gisele BÃ¼ndchenâ€™s divorce was finalised in October 2022, the path was not all that rosy for them. Many accused Gisele of being a â€œgold diggerâ€ and she had a pretty tough time dealing with her separation. The once most loved couple, Tom Brady and Gisele BÃ¼ndchen were now in the eye of the storm. Tom Bradyâ€™s Ex Wife Gisele Bundchen Was Accused Of Being A CheaterBut Gisele BÃ¼ndchen did manage to move on and found love in another man - her jiu-jitsu instructor, Joaquim Valente. In October 2023, the two began dating each other but soon after they found themselves in the middle of a controversy as many accused Gisele BÃ¼ndchen of cheating on Tom Brady with her new boyfriend.When Netlfix released â€œThe Roast Of Tom Bradyâ€ in 2024, many jokes were made about Gisele BÃ¼ndchenâ€™s new relationship. Hollywood actor and famous comedians Kevin Hart and Nikki Glaser made multiple jokes about Tom Bradyâ€™s failed marriage and his ex wifeâ€™s new relationship.â€” _MLFootball (@_MLFootball) This did not go down very well with Tom Bradyâ€™s ex wife, Gisele BÃ¼ndchen and as per People, she was â€œdeeply hurtâ€ by the jokes that were made at her expense on The Roast Of Tom Brady. As per U.S. Weekly, Tom Brady even had to apologise to Gisele BÃ¼ndchen to make matters right since it involved their two children.Gisele BÃ¼ndchen had also broken up with her boyfriend for some time after the roast. But they got back soon after and in October 2024, the two announced they are welcoming a child soon.Also Read: Tyreek Hill's wife, Keeta Vaccaro, and her mom stir drama with remarks about breastfeeding and athletes' girlfriends amid Tyreek's kids with multiple women

title: CA Electrical Group Revolutionizes Residential Electrical Services in San Jose | Markets | bigspringherald.com
text:
San Jose, CA - CA Electrical Group, a leading electrical services provider based in San Jose, is proud to announce its exceptional residential electrician services. With a team of highly skilled and experienced electricians, CA Electrical Group is committed to delivering top-notch electrical solutions to homeowners in San Jose and the surrounding areas.
Home electrical systems play a crucial role in ensuring the safety, functionality, and comfort of residences. CA Electrical Group understands the importance of reliable and efficient electrical services, and their team of residential electricians is equipped with the knowledge and expertise to handle a wide range of electrical projects.
Whether it's installing new electrical fixtures, upgrading electrical panels, or troubleshooting electrical issues, CA Electrical Group's residential electricians are dedicated to providing superior craftsmanship and exceptional customer service. They work closely with homeowners to understand their specific electrical needs and provide customized solutions that meet their requirements.
"CA Electrical Group is excited to bring our expertise and exceptional service to homeowners in San Jose," said Idan Ben Moshe the CEO at CA Electrical Group. "We understand that electrical projects can be complex and require professional expertise. Our team of residential electricians is committed to delivering high-quality workmanship, reliable solutions, and excellent customer service to ensure that homeowners' electrical systems are safe, efficient, and up to code."
CA Electrical Group takes pride in its attention to detail, prompt response times, and transparent communication throughout every project. Their residential electricians utilize the latest tools, techniques, and industry best practices to ensure that all electrical work is performed to the highest standards.
For more information about CA Electrical Group's expert residential electrician services or to schedule a consultation, please visit https://caelectricalgroup.com/ - https://caelectricalgroup.wordpress.com/2023/12/28/press-release-nov-electrician-maintenance/ or contact us at (669) 260-0712.
About CA Electrical Group:
CA Electrical Group is a trusted electrical services provider based in San Jose, CA. With a team of highly skilled residential electricians, they specialize in meeting the electrical needs of homeowners in San Jose and surrounding areas. Committed to excellence, CA Electrical Group is known for delivering top-quality workmanship, exceptional customer service, and reliable solutions.

author: Mike.Farmer
title: Illinois plays bad - like really bad - in overtime loss at Nebraska
text:
LINCOLN, Neb. â€” Another bad loss in Big Ten play.
Nebraska entered Thursdayâ€™s game as the losers of six straight Big Ten games, including two blowout losses. The Illini have struggled recently too, but were coming off a mostly dominant win over Northwestern just four days ago.
Yet, Nebraska outlasted Illinois in overtime in Lincoln, winning 80-74, without either team playing particularly well. Illinois closed the gap late with some timely shooting from Dra Gibbs-Lawhorn and Will Riley, but couldn't pull it out in the end.
Illinois beat themselves in this one. The lack of a functioning offense, attributed to bad shooting and lazy turnovers caused their downfall, even though they managed to force overtime.
â€œWeâ€™re the youngest team in Power Four,â€ Brad Underwood said postgame. â€œWeâ€™ve had two games without Kasparas, weâ€™re three now without Tomi...Itâ€™s nice when we have our pieces and would like to continue to grow. It is frustrating for me, because I know where we could be and where weâ€™re getting to. Tonightâ€™s frustrating for me because of the mental lapses we had that we haven't been making. I don't know when we get whole again.â€
It was another poor shooting night for Illinois (14-7, 6-5 Big Ten), who went 10-for-42 from downtown, including 0-for-8 in overtime. Freshman Will Riley did his best to keep Illinois alive in the second half, finishing with 16 points on the night.
For the ninth time in 11 conference games, Illinois shot under 33% from distance. Nebraska (13-8, 3-7 Big Ten) is one of the worst teams in the conference at defending the three-pointer, yet Illinois was unable to capitalize.
Illinois managed to stick around in the first half despite shooting just 3-for-18 from beyond the arc and not recording a single assist. They went without a field goal for nearly six minutes, but didn't trail by more than five points during that scoring drought.
Nebraska eventually capitalized on Illinoisâ€™ poor shooting, costly turnovers, and foul trouble, going on a 16-6 run late in the half. The Cornhuskers caught the Illini sleeping several times, scoring in transition easily and getting wide-open dunks due to defensive miscommunications. They took a 40-31 lead into the break.
Illinois shot better in the second half, led by Rileyâ€™s three triples, but played incredibly sloppy basketball otherwise. Nebraskaâ€™s veteran roster took advantage of lazy turnovers and uncharacteristic mistakes from Brad Underwoodâ€™s squad.
â€œTonight was very uncharacteristic of us from a scouting report standpoint making those turnovers,â€ Underwood said. â€œNot gonna beat anybody doing that.â€
Sophomore center Tomislav Ivisic (mononucleosis) missed his third consecutive game. Illinois clearly missed his presence, as they were outscored 44-28 in the paint. The Illini didn't have much offensive success down low and struggled to initiate much offense in general.
â€œWithout Tomi...weâ€™re not the greatest post-up team in the world,â€ said Underwood. â€œWeâ€™ve gotta be able to crease the defense with our guards and we have been. Weâ€™re one of the top teams in the country with two-point rate. Tonight, we didn't do it very well and that's a tribute to their defense.â€
Illinois had won nine straight games against Nebraska, with three of those wins coming in Lincoln.
STAT STUFFERS
- Kasparas Jakucionis (ILL) â€” 18 points, 13 rebounds, 4 assists
- Will Riley (ILL) â€” 18 points, 4-for-10 3pt
- Dra Gibbs-Lawhorn (ILL) â€” 15 points, 4 rebounds
- Brice Williams (NU) â€” 27 points, 8 rebounds, 4 assists
- Connor Essegian (NU) â€” 14 points, 4 rebounds
YOU GOTTA SEE THIS
Clutch shooting from the sophomore.
Gibbs-Lawhorn ties it up in Lincoln â€¼ï¸
â€” Big Ten Men's Basketball (@B1GMBBall)[@IlliniMBB][#B1GMBBall]on FS1[pic.twitter.com/UESumBTi8i][January 31, 2025]
UP NEXT
Illinois returns home to Champaign for a game against Ohio State on Sunday. The game is at noon and can be watched on CBS.

author: Poster
title: Smooth Skin Awaits: The Benefits of Professional Skin Tags Removal Services
text:
Skin tags, those small, benign growths that often appear in skin folds, can be a source of discomfort and self-consciousness for many individuals. If you're looking to bid farewell to these unwanted skin tags, professional skin tags removal services offer a safe and effective solution. In this article, we'll explore the advantages of opting for professional removal services to achieve smoother, clearer skin.
Expert Evaluation and Diagnosis:
Professional skin tags removal services begin with a thorough evaluation and diagnosis by trained skincare experts. Dermatologists or licensed practitioners can accurately identify skin tags, ensuring that the growths are benign and ruling out any potential complications. This professional assessment is crucial for a safe and effective removal process.
Safe and Painless Procedures:
Professional
skin tags removal services utilize safe and painless procedures to eliminate the growths. Common methods include excision, cryotherapy (freezing), or cauterization. These techniques are performed with precision, minimizing the risk of scarring or infection. Professional removal ensures that the procedure is carried out in a sterile environment, reducing the chances of complications.
Customized Treatment Plans:
Not all skin tags are the same, and professional removal services recognize this variability. Skincare professionals can create customized treatment plans tailored to the individual's specific skin type, the location of the skin tags, and any other relevant factors. This personalized approach ensures optimal results and minimizes the likelihood of scarring or skin damage.
Immediate Results:
Unlike over-the-counter remedies or DIY solutions, professional removal services offer immediate results. The removal process is typically quick, and patients can enjoy smoother skin almost immediately after the procedure. This instant transformation contributes to increased confidence and a sense of well-being.
Follow-up Care and Guidance:
After the removal procedure, professional skin tags removal services often include follow-up care and guidance. Skincare professionals provide instructions on post-treatment care to promote optimal healing and reduce the risk of complications. Additionally, they may offer advice on preventing future skin tags and maintaining healthy skin.
Enhanced Aesthetic Outcome:
Professional removal services prioritize aesthetic outcomes, aiming to leave the skin clear and smooth. Dermatologists and skincare experts are trained to perform removals with precision, minimizing any potential scarring or damage. The result is not only a tag-free skin surface but also an aesthetically pleasing appearance.
Conclusion :
opting for professional skin tags removal services offers a range of benefits, from expert diagnosis to safe and painless removal procedures. The personalized approach, immediate results, and follow-up care provided by skincare professionals ensure a positive and satisfying experience. Say goodbye to the inconvenience of skin tags and embrace smoother, clearer skin with the assistance of professional removal services.
